summary: Siddharth and Sonia are happily married to each other until Anna walks into Siddharth's life. Things takes a worst turn, when Anna gets killed and Siddharth finds himself in deep trouble.
cast: Emraan Hashmi|Shamita Shetty|Udita Goswami|Sameer Kochhar|Ninad Kamat|Meera|Anup J. Patel|Vishwajeet Pradhan
title: Zeher
